pullRequest.title: BFD-211: Fix for broken AWS terraform provider >= 2.61.0
pullRequest.bodyText:
Hotfix for: hashicorp/terraform-provider-aws#13236
This should be reverted one we validate that the most recent AWS provider version works again.

commit.message: Roll back AWS terraform provider due to https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-aws/issues/13236

nodes.bodyText:
I always try to leave this or a TODO so that these things can be found. In this case, I'd probably also throw a Jira ticket for it in the backlog and reference that ticket ID here.
